entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:55 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 06:47 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.2°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -19.5°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
